attributes.action: DO NOT to make face masks compulsory but allow FREEDOM OF CHOICE!
attributes.additional_details:
There is conflicting opinions about wearing masks but plenty of evidence wearing masks are harmful. These include the build up of viral and bacteria on the mask plus the increased CO2 inhalation.
This is also about the freedom of choice which is being chipped away.
There are also concerns about the long term effects of these policies that need to be addressed.
The science has not been followed but misinformation has.
attributes.background: Allow the people to make their own choices regarding the wearing of masks. Mandate that no one can be made to wear a mask.
